title: for the gentle bruddas, and intuitive introverts, who want power.
Content:
when you are at the bottom, you must be HEAVY machiavellian in order to win, max fuckeries, max destruction, and by god you will win.

once you are at the top or you have successfully reached the top, STOP BEING MACHIAVELLIAN!

it is now time to master your higher spiritual self, purify completely, and go deeper within, whatever that may mean to you.

SEEK GOD!

PURIFY YOUR ART!
